summary: With the guilt of a young man's death on their hands, three friends see their relationship disintegrate as each vies for survival by trying to kill one another.
cast: Henry Thomas|Dominique Swain|Scott Bairstow|Sebastian DeVicente|José Wilker|Renata Fronzi|Lavínia Vlasak|Pedro Leitão|René Bittencourt|Jânio Souza Ricardo|Gustavo Lipsztein|Evan Astrowsky
title: Travesía mortal
